ROOT.sql:query: SELECT [ORG_PERSON].*, B.PARENT_UNIT_CODE, C.NAME FROM [ORG_PERSON] , [ORG_UNIT] B, [ORG_UNIT] C WHERE [ORG_PERSON].ENT_CODE = @ENT_CODE AND [ORG_PERSON].USAGE_STATE = 'A' AND [ORG_PERSON].UNIT_CODE = B.UNIT_CODE AND B.PARENT_UNIT_CODE = C.UNIT_CODE AND ( DISPLAY_NAME LIKE @DN+'%' OR @DN is null) FOR XML AUTO
